definition: a dining-room attendant who is in charge of the waiters and the seating of customers, to be the captain of a sports team
details:
noun
- a dining-room attendant who is in charge of the waiters and the seating of customers
= synonyms: headwaiter
- the pilot in charge of an airship
= synonyms: senior pilot
- the naval officer in command of a military ship
= synonyms: skipper
- a policeman in charge of a precinct
= synonyms: police captain, police chief
- an officer holding a rank below a major but above a lieutenant
- the leader of a group of people
= example: the leader of a group of people
= synonyms: chieftain
- an officer who is licensed to command a merchant ship
= synonyms: master
verb
- to be the captain of a sports team
= example: to be the captain of a sports team
